attributes.action: Do not deport refugees to Rwanda
attributes.additional_details: The deportation of refugees to Rwanda is immoral and unethical, it is not representative of British values and potentially exposes people to human rights abuses.
attributes.background: Block the proposed deportation of refugees arriving in the UK to Rwanda.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
